unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for organizations seeking fresh talent. IIM Ahmedabad and similar institutions are prime recruitment grounds. Early engagement, perhaps even pre-placement talks as depicted in “3 Idiots”, fosters brand loyalty. A structured process, offering competitive packages starting at Rs. 8 lakhs per annum, is vital. Location shouldn't be a barrier; candidates from even remote locations like, say, Itanagar deserve consideration. A thorough background check is essential. Consider offering relocation assistance and accommodation.
